meta.title: About Us | Aviso
meta.description: AI for Sales. Aviso uses Machine Learning and Time-Series data to predict the probablity that a deal will close. Find your revenue True North.

content.title: High-performance selling teams use Aviso to succeed

items.title: Luis Cifuentes
items.subtitle: Sales Enablement Leader
items.description: I am bullish about their technology. Their model predicted CRM Wins for Q3 with more than 95% accuracy without any tweaking. Aviso enables us to take some cost out of salesforce licenses so GMs, regional sales leaders do not need Salesforce licenses.

items.title: Jason Mead
items.subtitle: VP, Global Revenue Operations
items.description: High-performance athletes have long known the value of analyzing signals and being agile enough to respond to drive performance. Aviso Al is the only platform that can truly say they are an Al-based GTM compass!

items.title: Brad Stratton
items.subtitle: Chief Revenue Officer
items.description: I have been a customer for 5 years at 2 companies, and the analytics are next level. I evaluated Clari a year ago, and it's not close. The outlook integration is very insightful, as you can dive deep into analyzing customer touches and stalled deals.

items.title: Tammy Sexton
items.subtitle: VP Enterprise Sales
items.description: Great product! I will never live without it moving forward. Love it! Aviso offers great insights into deal health and a fantastic history that allows you to use data to determine which sales reps and managers are accurate forecasters.

items.title: Luis Cifuentes
items.subtitle: Sales Enablement Leader
items.description: I am bullish about their technology. Their model predicted CRM Wins for Q3 with more than 95% accuracy without any tweaking. Aviso enables us to take some cost out of salesforce licenses so GMs, regional sales leaders do not need Salesforce licenses.
